# Regression with Categorical Features

So far we have covered an example of regression using numeric features.

However in practice, it is common for some features to be categorical. In these cases, [data encoding](../ml-foundations/data-encoding.qmd) strategies are required to convert the categories into numeric inputs the model can use.
